DOC.criteria: Ability provide inform consent release health information Ability follow study instruction study requirement Have hypertrophic keloid scar accessible treatment evaluation Negative pregnancy test woman childbearing potential Agreement use effective birth control method study duration History allergy sensitivity component History diabetes History collagen vascular disorder Anticipated need surgery hospitalization study Pregnant , nursing , plan pregnancy study Current enrollment investigational drug device study participation study within last 30 day prior Baseline ( Day 0 )
